23// string to store the title for a multi-pages text+subtext
24#define TMP_STRING_MAX_LEN 24

27#define NB_MAX_LAYERS 3

29/**********************

35typedef enum {
36 TEXT_STEP = 0,
37 CENTERED_INFO_STEP,
38 MENU_LIST_STEP
39} StepStype_t;
40
44typedef struct TextContext_s {
45 uint8_t nbPages;
46 uint8_t currentPage;
47 const char *txtStart;
48 const char *nextPageStart;
49 const char *subTxtStart;
50
51 nbgl_stepPosition_t pos;
52 nbgl_stepButtonCallback_t onActionCallback;
54 char tmpString[TMP_STRING_MAX_LEN];
56 nbgl_contentCenteredInfoStyle_t
57 style;
58} TextContext_t;
59
63typedef struct MenuListContext_s {
64 nbgl_stepMenuListCallback_t
65 selectedCallback;
66 nbgl_layoutMenuList_t
67 list;
68} MenuListContext_t;
69
70typedef struct StepContext_s {
71 union {
72 TextContext_t textContext;
73 MenuListContext_t menuListContext;
74 };
75 nbgl_screenTickerConfiguration_t ticker;
76 nbgl_layout_t *layout;
77 StepStype_t type;
78 bool modal;
79} StepContext_t;
80
81/**********************
82 * STATIC VARIABLES
83 **********************/
85static StepContext_t contexts[NB_MAX_LAYERS];

87/**********************
88 * VARIABLES

90#ifdef BUILD_SCREENSHOTS
91// Contains the last string index used
92extern UX_LOC_STRINGS_INDEX last_string_id;
93
94// Variables used to store important values (nb lines, bold state etc)
95extern uint16_t last_nb_lines;
96extern uint16_t last_nb_pages;
97extern bool last_bold_state;
98#endif // BUILD_SCREENSHOTS

104static void actionCallback(nbgl_layout_t *layout, nbgl_buttonEvent_t event);
105static void menuListActionCallback(nbgl_layout_t *layout, nbgl_buttonEvent_t event);
106
107// returns a non-used step context from the contexts[] array, or NULL if not found
108static StepContext_t *getFreeContext(StepStype_t type, bool modal)
109{
110 StepContext_t *ctx = NULL;
111
112 if (!modal) {
113 // Index 0 is reserved for background
114 ctx = &contexts[0];
115 }
116 else {
117 uint32_t i = 1;
118 while (i < NB_MAX_LAYERS) {
119 if (contexts[i].layout == NULL) {
120 ctx = &contexts[i];
121 break;
122 }
123 i++;
124 }
125 }
126 if (ctx == NULL) {
127 LOG_FATAL(STEP_LOGGER, "getFreeContext(): no available context\n");
128 }
129 else {
130 memset(ctx, 0, sizeof(StepContext_t));
131 ctx->type = type;
132 ctx->modal = modal;
133 }
134 return ctx;
135}
136
137// returns the step context from the contexts[] array matching with the given layout handler, or
138// NULL if not found
139static StepContext_t *getContextFromLayout(nbgl_layout_t layout)
140{
141 StepContext_t *ctx = NULL;
142 uint32_t i = 0;
143 while (i < NB_MAX_LAYERS) {
144 if (contexts[i].layout == layout) {
145 ctx = &contexts[i];
146 break;
147 }
148 i++;
149 }
150 if (ctx == NULL) {
151 LOG_WARN(STEP_LOGGER, "getContextFromLayout(): no matching context\n");
152 }
153 return ctx;
154}
155
156// from the current details context, return a pointer on the details at the given page
157static const char *getTextPageAt(StepContext_t *ctx, uint8_t textPage)
158{
159 uint8_t page = 0;
160 const char *currentChar = ctx->textContext.txtStart;
161 while (page < textPage) {
162 if (page < (ctx->textContext.nbPages - 1)) {
163 uint16_t len;
164 nbgl_getTextMaxLenInNbLines(BAGL_FONT_OPEN_SANS_REGULAR_11px_1bpp,
165 currentChar,
166 AVAILABLE_WIDTH,
167 NB_MAX_LINES,
168 &len,
169 true);
170 currentChar = currentChar + len;
171 }
172 page++;
173 }
174 return currentChar;
175}
176
177// from the current details context, return a pointer on the details at the given page, for subText
178static const char *getSubTextPageAt(StepContext_t *ctx, uint8_t textPage)
179{
180 uint8_t page = 0;
181 const char *currentChar = ctx->textContext.subTxtStart;
182 while (page < textPage) {
183 if (page < (ctx->textContext.nbPages - 1)) {
184 uint16_t len;
185 nbgl_getTextMaxLenInNbLines(BAGL_FONT_OPEN_SANS_REGULAR_11px_1bpp,
186 currentChar,
187 AVAILABLE_WIDTH,
188 NB_MAX_LINES - 1,
189 &len,
190 true);
191 currentChar = currentChar + len;
192 }
193 page++;
194 }
195 return currentChar;
196}
197
198// utility function to compute navigation arrows
199static nbgl_layoutNavIndication_t getNavigationInfo(nbgl_stepPosition_t pos,
200 uint8_t nbPages,
201 uint8_t currentPage)
202{
203 nbgl_layoutNavIndication_t indication = NO_ARROWS;
204
205 if (nbPages > 1) {
206 if (currentPage > 0) {
207 indication |= LEFT_ARROW;
208 }
209 if (currentPage < (nbPages - 1)) {
210 indication |= RIGHT_ARROW;
211 }
212 }
213 if (pos == FIRST_STEP) {
214 indication |= RIGHT_ARROW;
215 }
216 else if (pos == LAST_STEP) {
217 indication |= LEFT_ARROW;
218 }
219 else if (pos == NEITHER_FIRST_NOR_LAST_STEP) {
220 indication |= RIGHT_ARROW | LEFT_ARROW;
221 }
222 return indication;
223}
224
225// function used to display the current page in details review mode
226static void displayTextPage(StepContext_t *ctx, uint8_t textPage)
227{
228 const char *txt;
229
230 // if move backward or first page
231 if (textPage <= ctx->textContext.currentPage) {
232 // recompute current start from beginning
233 if (ctx->textContext.subTxtStart == NULL) {
234 txt = getTextPageAt(ctx, textPage);
235 }
236 else {
237 txt = getSubTextPageAt(ctx, textPage);
238 }
239 }
240 // else move forward
241 else {
242 txt = ctx->textContext.nextPageStart;
243 }
244 ctx->textContext.currentPage = textPage;
245
246 if (ctx->textContext.currentPage < (ctx->textContext.nbPages - 1)) {
247 uint16_t len;
248 uint8_t nbLines
249 = (ctx->textContext.subTxtStart == NULL) ? NB_MAX_LINES : (NB_MAX_LINES - 1);
250 nbgl_getTextMaxLenInNbLines(
251 BAGL_FONT_OPEN_SANS_REGULAR_11px_1bpp, txt, AVAILABLE_WIDTH, nbLines, &len, true);
252 // memorize next position to save processing
253 ctx->textContext.nextPageStart = txt + len;
254 }
255 else {
256 ctx->textContext.nextPageStart = NULL;
257 }
258 nbgl_layoutDescription_t layoutDescription;
259 nbgl_layoutNavigation_t navInfo = {
260 .direction = HORIZONTAL_NAV,
261 };
262
263 layoutDescription.modal = ctx->modal;
264 layoutDescription.onActionCallback = actionCallback;
265 layoutDescription.ticker.tickerCallback = ctx->ticker.tickerCallback;
266 layoutDescription.ticker.tickerIntervale = ctx->ticker.tickerIntervale;
267 layoutDescription.ticker.tickerValue = ctx->ticker.tickerValue;
268 ctx->layout = nbgl_layoutGet(&layoutDescription);
269
270 navInfo.indication = getNavigationInfo(
271 ctx->textContext.pos, ctx->textContext.nbPages, ctx->textContext.currentPage);
272
273 if (ctx->textContext.subTxtStart == NULL) {
274 nbgl_layoutAddText(ctx->layout, txt, NULL, ctx->textContext.style);
275 }
276 else {
277 if (ctx->textContext.nbPages == 1) {
278 nbgl_layoutAddText(ctx->layout, ctx->textContext.txtStart, txt, ctx->textContext.style);
279 }
280 else {
281 SPRINTF(ctx->textContext.tmpString,
282 "%s (%d/%d)",
283 ctx->textContext.txtStart,
284 ctx->textContext.currentPage + 1,
285 ctx->textContext.nbPages);
286 nbgl_layoutAddText(
287 ctx->layout, ctx->textContext.tmpString, txt, ctx->textContext.style);
288 }
289 }
290 if (navInfo.indication != NO_ARROWS) {
291 nbgl_layoutAddNavigation(ctx->layout, &navInfo);
292 }
293 nbgl_layoutDraw(ctx->layout);
294 nbgl_refresh();
295}
296
297// callback on key touch
298static void actionCallback(nbgl_layout_t *layout, nbgl_buttonEvent_t event)
299{
300 StepContext_t *ctx = getContextFromLayout(layout);
301
302 if (!ctx) {
303 return;
304 }
305 if (event == BUTTON_LEFT_PRESSED) {
306 if (ctx->textContext.currentPage > 0) {
307 displayTextPage(ctx, ctx->textContext.currentPage - 1);
308 return;
309 }
310 else if ((ctx->textContext.pos == LAST_STEP)
311 || (ctx->textContext.pos == NEITHER_FIRST_NOR_LAST_STEP)) {
312 ctx->textContext.onActionCallback((nbgl_step_t) ctx, event);
313 }
314 }
315 else if (event == BUTTON_RIGHT_PRESSED) {
316 if (ctx->textContext.currentPage < (ctx->textContext.nbPages - 1)) {
317 displayTextPage(ctx, ctx->textContext.currentPage + 1);
318 return;
319 }
320 else if ((ctx->textContext.pos == FIRST_STEP)
321 || (ctx->textContext.pos == NEITHER_FIRST_NOR_LAST_STEP)) {
322 ctx->textContext.onActionCallback((nbgl_step_t) ctx, event);
323 }
324 }
325 else if (event == BUTTON_BOTH_PRESSED) {
326 ctx->textContext.onActionCallback((nbgl_step_t) ctx, event);
327 }
328}
329
330static void displayMenuList(StepContext_t *ctx)
331{
332 nbgl_layoutDescription_t layoutDescription
333 = {.modal = ctx->modal, .onActionCallback = menuListActionCallback};
334 nbgl_layoutMenuList_t *list = &ctx->menuListContext.list;
335
336 layoutDescription.ticker.tickerCallback = ctx->ticker.tickerCallback;
337 layoutDescription.ticker.tickerIntervale = ctx->ticker.tickerIntervale;
338 layoutDescription.ticker.tickerValue = ctx->ticker.tickerValue;
339
340 ctx->layout = nbgl_layoutGet(&layoutDescription);
341 nbgl_layoutAddMenuList(ctx->layout, list);
342 if (list->nbChoices > 1) {
343 nbgl_layoutNavigation_t navInfo = {.direction = VERTICAL_NAV};
344 navInfo.indication = 0;
345 if (list->selectedChoice > 0) {
346 navInfo.indication |= LEFT_ARROW;
347 }
348 if (list->selectedChoice < (list->nbChoices - 1)) {
349 navInfo.indication |= RIGHT_ARROW;
350 }
351
352 if (navInfo.indication != NO_ARROWS) {
353 nbgl_layoutAddNavigation(ctx->layout, &navInfo);
354 }
355 }
356 nbgl_layoutDraw(ctx->layout);
357 nbgl_refresh();
358}
359
360// callback on key touch
361static void menuListActionCallback(nbgl_layout_t *layout, nbgl_buttonEvent_t event)
362{
363 StepContext_t *ctx = getContextFromLayout(layout);
364 if (!ctx) {
365 return;
366 }
367
368 if (event == BUTTON_LEFT_PRESSED) {
369 if (ctx->menuListContext.list.selectedChoice > 0) {
370 ctx->menuListContext.list.selectedChoice--;
371 displayMenuList(ctx);
372 }
373 }
374 else if (event == BUTTON_RIGHT_PRESSED) {
375 if (ctx->menuListContext.list.selectedChoice < (ctx->menuListContext.list.nbChoices - 1)) {
376 ctx->menuListContext.list.selectedChoice++;
377 displayMenuList(ctx);
378 }
379 }
380 else if (event == BUTTON_BOTH_PRESSED) {
381 ctx->menuListContext.selectedCallback(ctx->menuListContext.list.selectedChoice);
382 }
383}
384
385/**********************
386 * GLOBAL FUNCTIONS
387 **********************/
388
403nbgl_step_t nbgl_stepDrawText(nbgl_stepPosition_t pos,
404 nbgl_stepButtonCallback_t onActionCallback,
405 nbgl_screenTickerConfiguration_t *ticker,
406 const char *text,
407 const char *subText,
408 nbgl_contentCenteredInfoStyle_t style,
409 bool modal)
410{
411#ifdef BUILD_SCREENSHOTS
412 // Initialize a default area
413 nbgl_area_t area;
414 area.x0 = area.y0 = 0;
415 area.width = AVAILABLE_WIDTH;
416 area.height = NB_MAX_LINES * nbgl_getFontLineHeight(BAGL_FONT_OPEN_SANS_REGULAR_11px_1bpp);
417#endif // BUILD_SCREENSHOTS
418 StepContext_t *ctx = getFreeContext(TEXT_STEP, modal);
419 if (!ctx) {
420 return NULL;
421 }
422 // initialize context (already set to 0 by getFreeContext())
423 ctx->textContext.onActionCallback = onActionCallback;
424 if (ticker) {
425 ctx->ticker.tickerCallback = ticker->tickerCallback;
426 ctx->ticker.tickerIntervale = ticker->tickerIntervale;
427 ctx->ticker.tickerValue = ticker->tickerValue;
428 }
429
430 // if no subText, get the number of pages for main text
431 if (subText == NULL) {
432 ctx->textContext.nbPages = nbgl_getTextNbPagesInWidth(
433 BAGL_FONT_OPEN_SANS_REGULAR_11px_1bpp, text, NB_MAX_LINES, AVAILABLE_WIDTH);
434#ifdef BUILD_SCREENSHOTS
435 store_string_infos(text,
436 BAGL_FONT_OPEN_SANS_REGULAR_11px_1bpp,
437 &area,
438 true,
439 last_nb_lines,
440 last_nb_pages,
441 last_bold_state);
442#endif // BUILD_SCREENSHOTS
443 }
444 else {
445#ifdef BUILD_SCREENSHOTS
446 uint16_t nb_lines_title;
447 // Call this function to get correct nb_lines/nb_pages for text field.
448 nbgl_getTextNbPagesInWidth(
449 BAGL_FONT_OPEN_SANS_REGULAR_11px_1bpp, text, NB_MAX_LINES, AVAILABLE_WIDTH);
450 nb_lines_title = last_nb_lines;
451 // There is a sub text, so no more than 3 lines for title...
452 if (nb_lines_title > 3) {
453 nb_lines_title = 3;
454 }
455 area.height
456 = nb_lines_title * nbgl_getFontLineHeight(BAGL_FONT_OPEN_SANS_REGULAR_11px_1bpp);
457 store_string_infos(text,
458 BAGL_FONT_OPEN_SANS_REGULAR_11px_1bpp,
459 &area,
460 true,
461 last_nb_lines,
462 last_nb_pages,
463 last_bold_state);
464#endif // BUILD_SCREENSHOTS
465 // NB_MAX_LINES-1 because first line is for main text
466 ctx->textContext.nbPages = nbgl_getTextNbPagesInWidth(
467 BAGL_FONT_OPEN_SANS_REGULAR_11px_1bpp, subText, NB_MAX_LINES - 1, AVAILABLE_WIDTH);
468#ifdef BUILD_SCREENSHOTS
469 area.height = (NB_MAX_LINES - nb_lines_title)
470 * nbgl_getFontLineHeight(BAGL_FONT_OPEN_SANS_REGULAR_11px_1bpp);
471 // If subTxtid is not valid, we'll use txtId for nb_lines/nb_pages values
472 store_string_infos(subText,
473 BAGL_FONT_OPEN_SANS_REGULAR_11px_1bpp,
474 &area,
475 true,
476 last_nb_lines,
477 last_nb_pages,
478 last_bold_state);
479#endif // BUILD_SCREENSHOTS
480 }
481 LOG_DEBUG(STEP_LOGGER,
482 "nbgl_stepDrawText: ctx = %p, nbPages = %d, pos = 0x%X\n",
483 ctx,
484 ctx->textContext.nbPages,
485 pos);
486 if (pos & BACKWARD_DIRECTION) {
487 // start with last page
488 ctx->textContext.currentPage = ctx->textContext.nbPages - 1;
489 }
490 ctx->textContext.txtStart = text;
491 ctx->textContext.subTxtStart = subText;
492 // keep only direction part of position
493 ctx->textContext.pos = pos & (RIGHT_ARROW | LEFT_ARROW);
494 ctx->textContext.style = style;
495 displayTextPage(ctx, ctx->textContext.currentPage);
496
497 return (nbgl_step_t) ctx;
498}
499
510nbgl_step_t nbgl_stepDrawCenteredInfo(nbgl_stepPosition_t pos,
511 nbgl_stepButtonCallback_t onActionCallback,
512 nbgl_screenTickerConfiguration_t *ticker,
513 nbgl_layoutCenteredInfo_t *info,
514 bool modal)
515{
516 nbgl_layoutDescription_t layoutDescription
517 = {.modal = modal, .onActionCallback = (nbgl_layoutButtonCallback_t) actionCallback};
518 nbgl_layoutNavigation_t navInfo = {
519 .direction = HORIZONTAL_NAV,
520 };
521 StepContext_t *ctx = getFreeContext(CENTERED_INFO_STEP, modal);
522 if (!ctx) {
523 return NULL;
524 }
525
526 // initialize context (already set to 0 by getFreeContext())
527 ctx->textContext.onActionCallback = onActionCallback;
528 if (ticker) {
529 ctx->ticker.tickerCallback = ticker->tickerCallback;
530 ctx->ticker.tickerIntervale = ticker->tickerIntervale;
531 ctx->ticker.tickerValue = ticker->tickerValue;
532 }
533
534 ctx->textContext.nbPages = 1;
535 // keep only direction part of position
536 ctx->textContext.pos = pos & (RIGHT_ARROW | LEFT_ARROW);
537 navInfo.indication = getNavigationInfo(
538 ctx->textContext.pos, ctx->textContext.nbPages, ctx->textContext.currentPage);
539
540 ctx->layout = nbgl_layoutGet(&layoutDescription);
541 nbgl_layoutAddCenteredInfo(ctx->layout, info);
542 if (navInfo.indication != NO_ARROWS) {
543 nbgl_layoutAddNavigation(ctx->layout, &navInfo);
544 }
545 nbgl_layoutDraw(ctx->layout);
546 nbgl_refresh();
547
548 LOG_DEBUG(STEP_LOGGER, "nbgl_stepDrawCenteredInfo(): step = %p\n", ctx);
549 return (nbgl_step_t) ctx;
550}
551
562nbgl_step_t nbgl_stepDrawMenuList(nbgl_stepMenuListCallback_t onActionCallback,
563 nbgl_screenTickerConfiguration_t *ticker,
564 nbgl_layoutMenuList_t *list,
565 bool modal)
566{
567 StepContext_t *ctx = getFreeContext(MENU_LIST_STEP, modal);
568 if (!ctx) {
569 return NULL;
570 }
571
572 // initialize context (already set to 0 by getFreeContext())
573 if (ticker) {
574 ctx->ticker.tickerCallback = ticker->tickerCallback;
575 ctx->ticker.tickerIntervale = ticker->tickerIntervale;
576 ctx->ticker.tickerValue = ticker->tickerValue;
577 }
578
579 ctx->menuListContext.list.nbChoices = list->nbChoices;
580 ctx->menuListContext.list.selectedChoice = list->selectedChoice;
581 ctx->menuListContext.list.callback = list->callback;
582 ctx->menuListContext.selectedCallback = onActionCallback;
583
584 displayMenuList(ctx);
585
586 LOG_DEBUG(STEP_LOGGER, "nbgl_stepDrawMenuList(): step = %p\n", ctx);
587
588 return (nbgl_step_t) ctx;
589}
590
597uint8_t nbgl_stepGetMenuListCurrent(nbgl_step_t step)
598{
599 StepContext_t *ctx = (StepContext_t *) step;
600 if (!ctx) {
601 return 0;
602 }
603 return (ctx->menuListContext.list.selectedChoice);
604}
605
612int nbgl_stepRelease(nbgl_step_t step)
613{
614 StepContext_t *ctx = (StepContext_t *) step;
615 int ret;
616
617 LOG_DEBUG(STEP_LOGGER, "nbgl_stepRelease(): ctx = %p\n", ctx);
618 if (!ctx) {
619 return -1;
620 }
621 ret = nbgl_layoutRelease((nbgl_layout_t *) ctx->layout);
622
623 ctx->layout = NULL;
624
625 return ret;
626}
